result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephen James Homan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50 fine plus costs. 60 days to pay fine/costs or set up payment plan with the Clerk of Courts office.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephen James Homan

records.addlTxt: 10:36 AM Defendant Stephen James Homan not in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Stephen James Homan.  Prosecuting attorney Aleksandra Hodowany in court for the State of Wisconsin State moves to amend charge and remove domestic abuse modifier.  Minute sheet. State gives plea agreement.  Court questions defendant on change of plea.  Rights/elements/max. penalties reviewed with defendant.  Defense enters no contest plea to amended ct. 1.  Defense stipulates to factual basis to accept plea.  Court finds plea made freely, knowingly and voluntarily, accepts plea, and finds guilty of amended ct.1. State/Defense join in sentence recommendation, make statements. Court imposes sentence.  Bond no longer in effect.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:06 AM Defendant Stephen James Homan in court.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Stephen James Homan.  Attorney Nicholas Paul Grode in court for State of Wisconsin. Court questions where matter is at.  Atty Viel requests another status date. Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on July 18, 2022 at 09:50 am.

2:35 PM Prosecuting attorney Colleen Catherine Nordin in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Stephen James Homan appeared by video.  Attorney Shannon Viel in court for Stephen James Homan. Court questions where matter is at.  Atty Viel requests another status.  Bond remains in effect.
Status conference scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 09:50 am.
Status conference on March 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Maintain absolute sobriety. No presence in bars, taverns, liquor stores or any establishment whose primary purpose is the sale and/or consumption of alcohol except for employment purposes. Not to possess or consume any alcohol. No violent contact direct or indirect with L.D.H.

11:47 AM Prosecuting attorney Nicholas Paul Grode appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Stephen James Homan appeared in court. Atty Shannon Viel appears in court for defendant Stephen Homan.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel.  Court questions Defendant on address/employment history. Court finds probable cause, sets bond. Defense waives formal reading of complaint, enters not guilty plea. Return
Status conference scheduled for March 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Cash bond posted by Stephan Homan.
